name: CurrentBitcoin
0:
”'Alexa, Open Current Bitcoin'”
”'Alexa, Ask Current Bitcoin for Prices'”
”'Alexa, Ask Current Bitcoin what the price is'”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: current bitcoin
des: An 'easy to use' Alexa skill that will provide you with the latest price for a bitcoin. This skill uses BitStamp's latest prices, which are always up-to-date. All you have to do to begin using the skill is ask Alexa, Ask Current Bitcoin for Prices. Price is given in USD.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
